overview:
Maxim Yevdokimov is the Chief Executive Officer at MOBI.Money. He joined MOBI.Money team from Suma Telecom Ukraine in 2011 where he served as General Director over two years and conducted full cycle of general management.

During 2005-09 Maxim worked as a consultant and advised a number of telecom companies in Russia and the CIS. He possess a decade of Telecom Product Development/Marketing & New Business Management expertise within CIS countries in local and international companies (Azerfon LLC (Nar Mobile), Celltick Technologies, Buongiorno Rus). In 2001-05 Mr. Yevdokimov worked at MegaFon, one of the TOP 3 largest mobile phone operator in Russia, as Head of Products and Services division, where he managed development and implementation one of the strategic area, mobile content service.

Maxim Yevdokimov heads New Technology working group of GSM Association of Russia.

He graduated with Distinction from Moscow State University of Culture and Arts
